com.camerontec.catalys.server.component

Class ComponentRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentRegistry

  • public final class ComponentRegistry
extends Object
    Runtime registry of all IComponent implementations in the system.

    All IComponent implementations are expected to registry here during IComponent.openComponent() in order for their lifecycles to be centrally managed.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ComponentRegistry getInstance()
        Return the singleton instance of the ComponentRegistry, creating it if necessary.
        Returns:
        ComponentRegistry The singleton instance.

      • clearInstance

        public static void clearInstance()
        Clears the underlying singleton instance and all of its contents.

        The next call to getInstance() will return a new object.

      • getComponentCounter

        public static int getComponentCounter()
        Return the current value of the component counter.

        This represents the total number of components registered not the current number of components registered.

        Returns:
        The current value of the component counter.

      • size

        public int size()
        Return the number of registered components.
        Returns:
        The number of registered components.

      • register

        public void register(IComponent component)
        Register the specified component.

        The component's IComponent.NAME_KEY attribute (if it exists) is used as its name. In that case it must be unique amongst all other coponents.

        If no IComponent.NAME_KEY attribute exists a unique name is generated automatically.

        Parameters:
        component - The component to be registered.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the component is null or has a non unique name.

      • deregister

        public IComponent deregister(IComponent component)
        Remove the specified component from the registry.
        Parameters:
        component - Component to be de-registered.
        Returns:
        true The de-registered component, or null if no component was de-registered.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the component is null.

      • deregister

        public IComponent deregister(String componentName)
        Remove the specified component from the registry.
        Parameters:
        componentName - Name of the component to be de-registered.
        Returns:
        The de-registered component, or null if no component was de-registered.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the component name is null.

      • getAllRegisteredComponents

        public IComponent[] getAllRegisteredComponents()
        Gets all currently registered components.
        Returns:
        Array of registered components.

      • getAllComponentNames

        public HashSet<String> getAllComponentNames()
        Returns:
        The names of all the components currently present in the registry.

      • findComponentByID

        public IComponent findComponentByID(String id)
        Looks for an IComponent according to the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - - The component's ID specified in the configuration.
        Returns:
        the IComponent if found or null if none is found by the given ID.

      • findComponentByType

        public IComponent[] findComponentByType(Class<?> type,
                                        boolean strictMatching)
        Returns an array of IComponent objects that are of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The Class object of the type.
        strictMatching - If true the class of the component must match exactly the specified type, if false the component can be a subclass of type.
        Returns:
        Array of found components or empty array if no matching component is found.

      • findComponentByType

        public IComponent[] findComponentByType(Class<?> type)
        Shortcut for findComponentByType(type, true).
        Parameters:
        type - The Class object of the type.
        Returns:
        Array of found components or empty array if no matching component is found.
